nodes.text: Danzal Galak Sr. was a Human male from the planet of Naboo who served as a Security Guard of the Royal Naboo Security Forces. He held the rank of Sergeant during the Invasion of Naboo, which took place in 32 BBY.

The character's name was first revealed in the Rogues Gallery department of Star Wars Insider 145. Tim Veekhoven, Kevin Beentjes and Sander de Lange, who did research for the article, saw him as the father of Galak, a character from the roleplaying game Star Wars: Invasion of Theed Adventure Game.
